data.title: THE MIDNIGHT GHOST TRAIN released new music video
data.meta_description: The guys from THE MIDNIGHT GHSOT TRAIN definitely know how to rock! No matter where, no matter when! Check out their brand new music video for the track “BC Trucker” & see that even a withered cornfield can’t stop them! The upcoming album Cold Was The Ground is available from…
data.text:
The guys from THE MIDNIGHT GHSOT TRAIN definitely know how to rock! No matter where, no matter when! Check out their brand new music video for the track “BC Trucker” & see that even a withered cornfield can’t stop them!

The upcoming album Cold Was The Ground is available from March 2nd in the UK & 10thUS/CAN on Napalm Records! Grab a look at their upcoming tour dates near you!

THE MIDNIGHT GHOST TRAIN

/w Greenleaf*
